name: Bonjardim Boutique Hotel
title: (6100-459) Bonjardim Boutique Hotel
description:
Welcome to Bonjardim Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Wines, an award-winning organic wine estate, slowfood restaurant and boutique hotel. The country manor dates back to 1756 and it is located in the tranquil green heart of Portugal. Wake up to vineyard views, indulge in wine tastings, explore our top-rated rooftop restaurant (rated 9+ / 10 on TheFork.com), or just take a relaxing walk in our private forest. Whether you’re a wine lover, digital nomad or foodie, we’ll make you forget the busy city life and help you explore the unspoiled center of Portugal.

Stay per night (includes water & electricity): €15 (if more than 2 persons, it is €3 per extra person)
Breakfast: €10 (reservation needed the day before)

Free amenities:
Indoor & Outdoor Swimming Pool
WiFi (password: bonjardim)
Parking for your motorbike
Top quality drinking water from our own well

Activities & services:
Wine cellar tour: €5 per person Wine tasting: €10 per person
Organic wine shop: You can buy Bonjardim natural wines in the restaurant. 
Wine course on request (min. 4 people): 1.5 hours (€25 per person). The themes are: Organic wine production; technical tasting; wine regions of Portugal; spirits. 
Restaurant with rooftop terrace: slowfood fusion menu with estate-grown and local produce. No reservations please, just walk in! For opening times, search “Bonjardim Sky Lounge Restaurant” or scan QR code:
Sauna: €7,50, Turkish bath: €7,50, Jacuzzi: €5
Massage: €40 / 0.5 hours , Yoga lessons: price on request
Picknick: €35, for 2 persons
Laundry: €5, pay at checkout.    Detergent is at the reception. Drying machine in winter is €2.50
Wastewater (black & grey): You can empty your wastewater at the dump station, located at the water tap at the Glamping’s solar panel. There are two covers where you can unload.
Waste: You can dispose of your waste in the bins in the small garage by the first gate (look for the tall palm trees).
Dog: €3 for the stay. Keep them leashed so our sheep don’t get chased. Pls remove any dog poop
Bathroom: find the outdoor bathroom down the stairs near the Glamping tents. The indoor shower and toilet are under the restaurant and 
Drinks: in the restaurant. Wines, beer, sodas, juice, sangria, cocktail, coffees, tea
Bread: You can get a bread bag if you want to order bread. On its label you write the number of bread buns you want (white or whole grain). Hang the bread bag in the evening, under the bell, at the main gate (tall palm trees). The baker comes at night; there’ll be bread in it tomorrow morning! (except Sundays). You can pay for it when you check out (€0.50/piece).
Checkout and payments are done at the restaurant reception, open from 10h00. If you want to check out earlier, please do the checkout on the evening before. 
Supermarket: Minimercado Salvador (1 km), supermarket Minipreço (2.5 km)

We hope you enjoy our little paradise we’ve been building since 1989.

title: (6100) Sertã -

title: (6100) Marmeleiro - Unnamed Road

name: Parque de Campismo do Bostelim
title: (6110) Parque de Campismo do Bostelim
description: Rural campsite (Summer time) but external flat parking open all year round. Inside camping, electricity, hot water shower, wc, grills, lots of shadows, river beach. Access to electricity and water.

title: (6100) Palhais - 534
description: Real fresh spring water. Delicious.

name: Quinta Do Bella Vista
title: (6100-317) Quinta Do Bella Vista
description:
A beautiful quinta set in 2,5 ha grassland.
BBQ and pizza oven available.
10 min walk into small town where all services and amenities are available.
2 min walk into adjacent forest.
Delicious spring water available from the borehole on the land.
Make contact with owners before arrival.

title: (6100) Cernache do Bonjardim - 24 Rua dos Peregrinos
title_short: (6100) Cernache do Bonjardim - 24 Rua dos Peregrinos
description: Waterpoint, high pressure! Taste: not so good, like most taps.

title: (6100) Troviscal - Unnamed Road
description:
Very quiet spot in a paradisical location by a closed river beach. No services but bins for waste and river to swim in. Lots of hiking opportunities from here.
Low mobile reception, so if you are addicted to your phone go elsewhere.

title: (6100) Castelo Branco District - 2259 N237
description: Picnic stop outside the village and on a quiet road

name: Camping Portugo
title: (6100) Camping Portugo
description: Quinta Portugo is located right in the middle of Portugal (geographical center). ***The site is suitable for mini campers and camping buses up to 6.00 m.**** It is not far from our site to the Atlantic (approx. 60 minutes), to Spain (approx. 90 minutes), to the Serra da Estrela, Tomar, Coimbra, Lisbon and Porto. Our site is in a very quiet location, a small supermarket is within walking distance (700 m), otherwise there is a lot of nature here. Things to do in the immediate vicinity are e.g. B. a waterfall, a dam, a natural rock cave, hikes on the Rio Zezere and much more, please contact us. We have two small washhouses with hot water and a seasonal pool with a small snack bar. Electricity is available and free WiFi. We charge EUR 12.50 for one night. FOR A RESERVATION PLEASE CALL BEFORE OR SIGN BY WHATSAPP!!!

name: Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva
title: (6150) Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva
description:
"Parque Campismo Aldeia Ruiva"
Small camping with separate áreas for motorhomes, tents and bungalows, with dirty wathears under construction and near river beach.

name: Pedrogão Grande Camping Park
title: (3270) Pedrogão Grande Camping Park
description:
Pedrogão Grande Camping Park is located next to the Cabril dam over the River Zêzere, 1 km from the village of Pedrogão Grande. With exposure to the east and excellent views over the reservoir and its banks.
There are spacious and flat spaces, suitable for maneuvering and having your vehicle, caravan and/or accessories parked. There is a proper place to supply and unload sanitary cassettes. The Park has a central, circular path, entering on one side of the reception building and exiting on the other.

title: (6100) Vilões -
description:
Totally off grid, off road area. If you enjoy peace and solitude, you will love this area in the mountains. I would guess nobody has driven these tracks for weeks or months because i had to clear fallen burnt trees out of the way the get my MH thru.

Ensure you take a saw with you to clear your way.

title: (6110 183) Vila de Rei - 3 Avenida Sá Carneiro
title_short: (6110 183) Vila de Rei - 3 Avenida Sá Carneiro
description: Free service area

title: (6150) Proença-a-Nova -
description: Small parking lot, could spend the night there completely relaxed, including a 10m team. You can hardly hear the road above, the adjacent road is hardly used even in August.

title: (3270) - Unnamed Road
description: A quiet location, right on the Albufeira waterfront. There are picnic tables. Ideal for an overnight stay.

A beautiful view over the river, village of Dornes extremely beautiful and calm. Town Wi-Fi. Small fountain close to the church or in the cemetery

Strong recommendation to walk fown on foot first as there is no turning around when cars are parked. its rather small and with a bit difficult access (narrow road). I wouldn't recommend it during summer months as its right next to the local lake beach and many cars park in this tight spot. would be ok overnight though. easy access to dornes town by bike 5min or by cannoe / sup 2min /walking 20min

title: (6160) Vale Mós - EM528

In winter it’s quite cold up here and in wind the windmills are noisy. Big spot for a few campers, accessible with big Campers aswell.

title: (2240) - N348
description:
Small gravel car park with magnificent view of the lake. Some cars parked during the day. Quiet night, access to swimming. Single electricity plug inside a little warehouse free to use.
very nice view, access to the river, in the next beach there is a swimming pool.

title: (6150) Vale Água -

title: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere -

title_short: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - 3 Rua 25 de Abril

title: (2240) - N348

title: () - CM1158
description: Place where you can park your motor home for a night. Close to a public garden, and also a football camp with synthetic grass. Silent and quite. Near you have a lot of river beaches. Bathrooms close (just follow the indications).

name: Quinta da Cerejeira
title: (2240-333) Quinta da Cerejeira
description: Quiet and peaceful campsite. toilet evacuation area and clean water supply, no discharge of dirty water but available in the village at 1.5km.

title: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - CM1135-1
description: A 10-minute drive from Fragas de São Simão (with river beaches) and close to sport climbing spots. Quiet area surrounded by a small forest. On the same site is the Figueiró dos Vinhos Hunting Club and there are two tennis courts. Water tap without thread. Figueiró dos Vinhos county tourist map (Portuguese + English) at service area.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place in nature with natural swimming pools, a waterfall where you can swim (5 min. walk) beautiful playground for the kids, very nice hiking trails of wooden planks, toilets and (cold) showers. With larger campers you can stand on the plateaus. At 8.5 m it was easily accessible. Busy on weekends.

title: (6110) Vila de Rei - Rua da Praia
title_short: (6110) Vila de Rei - Rua da Praia

title: (6110) Vila de Rei - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice quiet place on the lake. We are alone here at the moment of writing. This place is not suitable for large campers, the road to it is unpaved, potholes and low hanging branches. With a 4x4 van with/or roof tent, like us, is very nice! what a rest.

title_short: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - Avenida 13 de Junho

This place is particularly practical for logistics (Food/fuel, Camping-Gas) but also for laundry since a self-service washing machine is available. The road adjoining the car park is quite busy but the nuisance is bearable. Optimal satellite and 4G reception.

title: (6160) Oleiros - N351

name: Camping Oleiros
title: (6160-301) Camping Oleiros
description: Awesome camping, very nice people, very clean and organized, the river beach is lesser then 50m from there. I recommend 100%

title: (3260) Figueiró Dos Vinhos -
description: Nice parking, Very calm in the winter. Very close To the river and trekking To a beautiful old stone village.

title: (3240) Avelar - Ferraria-Gondramaz-São Simão

name: Camping Quinta do Castanheiro
title: (3280) Camping Quinta do Castanheiro

title_short: (3280-022) Castanheira de Pêra - 24 Variante à Nacional 236

title_short: (3280) Castanheira de Pêra - Variante à Nacional 236

title_short: (3280-012) Castanheira de Pêra - 5 Avenida Adrião Reis
description: Public free and flat parking in the center of town, at the back of a supermarket. Close to everything: ATM, post office, taxi, coffe shops, supermarket, restaurants, bakery. Easy to be full at labor hours of working days.

title: () Castanheira de Pêra - 2 Variante à Nacional 236
title_short: () Castanheira de Pêra - 2 Variante à Nacional 236
description: Free parking near a river and a water park. During the day and at night, however, quite restless!

title: (2230) Souto -
description: Schöner Platz am See mit Badezugang. 2 Marmor Picknicktische. Gerader Stellplatz. Sehr steile Zufahrt bergab, für mutige Fahrer. Nicht für Wohnmobile.  NICHT größer als VW Bus. Achtet auf das Wetter. Regen—> rutschig

title: (3280) Castanheira de Pêra - EM510-1
description: Beautiful small parking near the river. Better for vans, big motorhomes will not fit in the parking

name: Camping Moinho
title: (3280) Camping Moinho
description: Pleasant and calm place. No services for motorhomes.

title: (2300) - 60 Estrada Barrinho
description:
Small sandy parking very particable. Just above the beach.
Very quiet at night.
The pleasure of the small evening at the water's edge and the morning splash.
Easy and accessible half-turn for all types of vehicles.

name: Camping Pelinos
title: () Camping Pelinos
description: Camping Pelinos - Very quiet site, generous locations, high hedges to separate the sites, swimming pool, very nice owners, nature environment. Sanitary flawless, nothing to complain about. service at the top.

title: (6150) Chão do Galêgo - EM1313
description: Newly constructed in 2022. Quiet spot on edge of small village. Services include toilet, shower (solar heated) and picnic tables. Near via ferrata, paragliding, BTT enduro/mountain bike and hiking trails including hilltop observation tower.

name: Camping Redondo
title: (2300-035) Camping Redondo
description: Camping REDONDO near TOMAR A garden of exceptional rarity warm welcome very clean and functional facilities A garden with various species swimming pool and barbecue

title: (3230) Ferraria Ferraria de São João - CM1196
title_short: (3230) Ferraria Ferraria de São João - CM1196
description: Mountainbike Funtrail of Ferraria de São João. This is the basecamp of the funtrail complete with picnic tables, hot showers, WC, large trash containers and a paid cleaning station for your bike. The trail looks pretty abandoned, the facilities however were open, proper and working. There's only space for 4 vehicles parked door to door, so I'd say 1 camper staying here is plenty.

title: (6150) Proença-a-Nova -
description: Parking with Dixie toilets and observation tower, some downhill biking, a viaFerrata. I stayed here and left after climbing. Access by gravel roads, sometimes steep, but totally doable with the t3 2WD.

title: (6150-214) Peral - 22 Rua da Escola
description: Very peaceful place. Only the sound of owls can be heard. The church bell rings from 7 am to 10 pm.

title: (6150) São Pedro Esteval - N351
description: Local picnic area with trash bins, drinking water and a sheltered barbecue area

title: (6120) Mação - 3 Alameda Infante Dom Henrique
description: Large paved parking lot. Close to the GNR and the center which has no interest. Public WC. Good satellite reception.

title: (3240) Chão de Couce - Rua Amarela
description:
VL and PL parking with picnic tables and trash can in an industrial zone. No shade but very quiet.
perfect for a stopover

title: (2230) Sardoal - Travessa Do Freião
description: Place to park maximum 4 motorhomes. 400m till local products shop (“Cá da Terra”) and cultural center. 750m till historic center (buildings and streets from XVI century; pillory) and tourist office.

title: (2230) Sardoal - Unnamed Road
description: The name of the spot is LAPA Nice and quite place (except warm weekends). With barbecue and tables. To the village is 2km the only problem is that during the night it is dark and if you need help no one will help you. I don't recommend to sleep there. (2017) This year the fire devastated some of his beauty. In the winter is more beautiful that in the summer, but in the summer you can swim and refresh. Has been remodeled this summer (2017).

title: (2230) Sardoal -
description: Motorhome and full service area, on SARDOAL small town (even on iconic EN2 road), which historic center and shops are accessible by walking. The key must be picked at the fire department.

title: (2200) Abrantes -
description: Nice and quiet place to pass day and night

title: (6120) Santarem - Ribra de Paia Fome
description: A viewing area with picnic benches, a wisteria-covered pergola, and great views of the tree-lined hills and river below. It is also on a very quiet road.

title: (6120) - Ribra de Paia Fome
description:
Beautiful.spot
Picnic área
nature
natural lake

name: Espaço campismo fora da rede
title: (6000-713) Espaço campismo fora da rede
description: Close to nature, between two small villages, some parking and tent sites (more or less easily accessible) await you on a private property by the river. Available: equipped open-air kitchen, drinking water, dining area and washing-up facilities, dry toilet, unheated shower, cell phone/laptop charging station, waste separation, access to the river. * Donation-based stays to improve services and maintenance * Depending on the season and our mood, we organize campfires, musical evenings, barbecues, pizzas, etc. and offer delicious meals (also vegan, vegetarian...) on request. The area invites you to beautiful mountain bike tours, hikes or yoga, a river beach to cool off is 1.5 km away, the nearest shops can be reached in 10 minutes by car. We offer additional services based on availability: DIY and workshop for repair and conversion of vehicles with or without technical assistance, bike maintenance, guided tours, shopping... Pets are allowed under certain conditions. A dominant female husky lives on the property and is very sociable with children and adults, but not with some of her own kind. We are happy to welcome you in several languages: English, French, German, Portuguese. :)

title: (3320-206) Pampilhosa da Serra - R. do Bairro São Martinho Lote 7 E
title_short: (3320-206) Pampilhosa da Serra - R. do Bairro São Martinho Lote 7 E
description: Mini Preco Supermarket with 24 hour laundry facilities.  Plenty of free parking and no height restriction.

address.street: R. do Bairro São Martinho Lote 7 E

title: (3320) Pampilhosa da Serra - EM547
description: Complete motorhome area (also motorhome washing machine) in mountainous Cabril river valley, about 600m away from village center and nice river beach. Flat but without shadows; few picnic tables. NOTE: payment only by cash (notes & coins); water filling (about 100 L). When arriving gate, touch button and get ticket, also used to pay (machine with few languages at right side of toilets) and open gate at outlet.

title: (2300) Tomar -
description: Beautiful little beach on Lake Carril, a stone's throw from Tomar! If you are looking for a place in nature for the night in order to visit Tomar the next day as I was, this is a great solution! Only downsides: the motorway which is really not far but little frequented at night, and the access which is a little steep on a dirt road should be avoided in rainy weather.

title: (3230-103) Louçainha - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place, beautiful landscape, spectacular pools with changing rooms, pic nic area, very nice restaurant !!!

title: (2230) Sardoal - N2
description: Quiet location by night, 300m away from EN2 road crossing and 150m from petrol station, with parking places not very flat to sleep. There are picnic tables, trash cans, water and a playground. About 500m away from lower area (several old fountains) of historic center of Sardoal village.

title: (2300) - Estrada Ribeira
description: Chaotic path, much too steep, very difficult to access and a lot of large mosquitoes on site. We did not stay. I do not recommend at all.

name: Quinta da Choupana
title: (2300-404) Quinta da Choupana
description:
Educational farm of 2.7 hectares, quiet and peaceful place. 4 km from the Templar city of Tomar, 30 km from the Sanctuary of Fátima, 1h30 from Lisbon and 2 hours from Porto. Near the dam of Castelo de Bode, Penedo Furado em Villa de Rei, dam of the Caril ...
Price for 2 adults and 2 children up to 13 years old. €5 extra per person.
Use of the swimming pool: €2/day/person.
THANKS

title: (6000) Cabeca Gorda - 28 Rua Principal
description: Fountain with drinking water

title: (3240) Ansião - 7 Avenida Doutor Vítor Faveiro
description: Parque do Mercado…optimal to visit the whole area…sossegado…care for fairs and market days (Saturday)

title: (6000) - Rua do Lagar
description: Small level gravel car park, on the edge of a road with little traffic and on the outskirts of the village. No service, optimal satellite reception but 4G almost nonexistent or yres perfectible. The place is not rural but can be useful for one night.

title: (2435) Formigais - Rua Principal
description:
Parking area, newly planned and stepwise, graveled. 
with some trees and trash bins. 
very quite at night. around 900m to walk to the river bath with toilets, showers and restaurant.
the parking areas near the bath are very crowded in the season. 
(only 2G with NOS)

title: (2435) Freixianda - 48 EN356
description: Extended picnic and rest area, with about 12 tables+seats and without shadows and 10 grills, toilets including handicap, two lakes with dukes. Large playground. Possible to overnight

title: (3240) Ansião - 2 Rua Manuel Melo
description: Park for small motorhomes

title: (3200) Lousã - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the top of the hill near the swing with great views. Flat ground and possibility to stay overnight. Don't block access track on the left hand side. no bins so take rubbish with you.

title: (3230-114) Espinhal - 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos
title_short: (3230-114) Espinhal - 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos
description: Quiet beautiful place with stream. Very recommended Large parking spot near stream, grass, trees, tables and benches. Next to ExperTree Park with rooftop climb. Stayed for 1 night with another camper, it was very quiet.

address.street: 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos

title: () - Rua Principal
description: Parking of the tourist site, small, cant provide hold, natural swimming pool very clean, restaurant, souvenirs, small beach at the end.

title: (3230-072) Espinhal - 1 Largo Feira
description: Good and quiet place for parking spend the night .. water and public clean toilets near by .. all the locals drink the water from the spring . small super market with the sweetest lady and her dog  just around the corner .. her name is Alice and the dogs name is Boneka .. about the bakery it’s the best corn bread called broa ever just past the church .. and the post office is just across the street will be back if I be near here ..

title: (3230-072) Espinhal - 10 Rua Mercado
description: Great place in a olive orchard to stay a night in a quite village .. there is garbage disposal container next to it and public toilets and an outdoor pick- nick table and a bakery close by that is open even on Sunday

title: (6185) Cambas - N112
description: Near the river, very quiet ?,  room for 2 or 3 motorhomes, public toilets nearby. fluvial beach nearby!!

name: CAMPING ENVENDOS
title: (6120) CAMPING ENVENDOS
description: Location 10 x 10 m approx. Field surrounded and we live on the spot. Warning !! There is no electricity, sanitation or emptying. You can have the services electricity and emptying free to 5 km. located in a very quiet place. In the heart of the mountains, village within 500 m. Climbing, fishing, ideal hiking. Grocery, bar, tobacco, restaurant. Free swimming pool nearby at 100 m Baker passing on the ground If you like the peace it is by here!

title: (6185) - N112
description: Nice small beach. Possible to park though it’s not properly for that. Spend one night here and was beautiful in the morning. Very quiet place. Small tap where you can drink water. It’s possible to park for night if you ask the local council,

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful and quite place in the middle of the forest. If you go into the trees becareful not getting lost :)

title: () - CM1088
description: I

title: (2200) - Unnamed Road
description: Sweet spot. free parking for any sized camper. lake to swim in. perfect

title: (3230) Fetais - CM1192
description: Nice spot high up in the mountains, with a spectacular open view. Penela is visible straigh in front with Espinhal on the left. Great for a night stay off grid.

title: (2300) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking very close to the water or for real off-roaders you can park by the water . very nice and calm. few People were enjoying the place on a weekend.

title: (6160) - N238
description: Parking near a relay antenna, after having mounted a stony track in good condition. Access to Via ferrata, hiking and climbing cliff equipped. No service, but clean. Calm assured and pleasant view.

title: (2300) Tomar - R. da Quinta das Gorduchas
title_short: (2300) Tomar - R. da Quinta das Gorduchas
description: Intermarche sells the blue Campingaz bottles

name: Camping Lake Portugal
title: (2300) Camping Lake Portugal
description: Super nice campsite in the countryside by the lake. Quality restaurant with local products. Ideal for discovering Portuguese cuisine. Hospitality and impeccable services (and in French). Very good address!

title: (2300) Tomar - 6 Rua Choromela
description: Lidl parking lot, open between 8.30-22 o'clock.  Very quiet and undisturbed at night.

title: (3230-347) Santa Eufémia - M558
description: CC service area, within the grounds of the shopping center and service station (Penela Center), paying drinking water, free black water and waste water discharge. No overnight parking.

title: (3200) Lousã - Unnamed Road
description:
Park right at the cliff with a stunning view over the stone village of Cerdeira. Only fits 1 small motorhome, although, behind it, there are more spots available for parking (just not with the same view).
It's not super leveled, but fine.
At the village there is a very small public river pool.
The village is amazing! It's called "home for creativity" since it's a place for art residences and other tourism.

Be careful about the access: it's a 3km very steep and narrow road with difficult curves for large vehicles.

This place is in the protected forest of Lousã. We had no problem with police, but be respectful about the area.

title: (2300) Tomar - 128B Bairro Hidroeléctrica do Zêzere
description: Quiet spot for a van or van short with a hold to level.

name: Parque de Pernoita do Terreiro das Bruxas
title: (3200) Parque de Pernoita do Terreiro das Bruxas
title_short: (3200) Parque de Pernoita do Terreiro das Bruxas
description: Beautifull spot in Serra da Lousã called Terreiro das Bruxas (Witches Path). Picnic spot and perfect for mountainbike or hiking. There's water in this spot

title: (2300) Tomar - 67 Rua de Coimbra
description: Very large laundry. 6 washing machines 8.12 and 20kms. 6 dryer. Coin mechanism and product included. On the avenue leading to the lidl. Pasteleria chorasqueira nearby. 20 minutes from the area in the modern district. A few meters higher a second laundry.

title: (6120) - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful place at a small waterfall. Access not easy! Rather 4x4! There is also a source of drinking water! Absolute peace! Google maps: Pego da Rainha

title: () Tomar - Rua Horta do Barão
description: Was once a community campsite, is now a free pitch. Laundry is possible on site on washboards. Ideally located for visiting the castle and the city. Public toilets at the sports center. Public toilets 100 m away at the stadium/playground. There are a few cats running around here who also live here, which may be the deciding factor for one or the other dog owner.

title: (3200) Lousã - Unnamed road
description: Superb village of Talasnal to visit, but to get there the path is very difficult to access. The street and the parking lot are in a dead end, the U-turn is difficult for heavy goods vehicles. Ideal place for light vehicles, van or van, because 6.5m van seems the maximum possible. In addition, the parking lot is not flat but on a very steep slope (10°), good brakes necessary.

title: (2300-153) Tomar - 8 Rua Amorim Rosa
description: Self service laundry, laundromat

title: (2200) Martinchel - 427 Rua da Igreja
description: Small parking lot, near the supermarket and café restaurant. Beside the national route N358.

title: (2300) Tomar - 1 Rua Santa Iria
description: Large municipal parking, be careful not parked on Thursdays and Fridays because there is the market, a sign tells you the times, otherwise parking place well for visits and quiet overall, it is better to park on the part at bottom of the car park yes there are the wooden barriers as there is room for cantilever and shade and about 25 seats

title: (6000) - EM546
description: New motorhome, next to pool and picnic area. Space for 5 mobile homes. The parking lot is divided for 15 cars and a maximum of 5 mobile homes. 1 EHU power socket at the tap. Potable water, Grey and Black waste available. The toilet is only open when the outdoor pool is open in season.

title: (2300) Tomar - Rua Aquiles da Mota Lima
title_short: (2300) Tomar - Rua Aquiles da Mota Lima
description: 2016.12.14 - Small parking on cobblestones facing the citadel / monastery on the edge of a quite noisy street and not far from the city center. This place completes the 2 nearby car parks already listed on Park4nigth. Here no maintenance service or wifi access. Nevertheless and close to the Bombeiros the bar Capitulo allows you to access the wifi with the code "superbock" (without parentheses!)

name: Campground Castelo do Bode
title: (2200) Campground Castelo do Bode
description: Campsite Castello de Bode. Service area inside campground.

title: (2300) Tomar - 14 Travessa João Freire Gameiro
description: Park it's allowed overnight, it's forbidden park at Friday because it's local market

title: (2435) Rio de Couros - 117 Rua Principal
description: Picnic area with 3 + 6 tables with seats, some with shadows. Also grill space aside right side tables.

name: Quinta das Lameiras
title: (2300) Quinta das Lameiras
description: Hello friends Our humble Biological Farm with an area of ​​3ha. We are 9km from the Templar city of Tomar, 4km from the river beach of Alverangel, 2.5km from the clean water river. Train station 3km away. We can be your Uber. We have a Hostel4campers with enough space for campers, caravans and some tents. Access to private bathroom; Common interior room (40m2 with sofas, swings and area for children to play; free kitchen with large table, free fridge, only washing machine and gas stove are paid ; There is also a outdoor leisure area with swings. Electricity 10amp; Disposal of dirty water and access to drinking water. Fresh homemade bread.. We can have a traditional Portuguese meal. We look forward to welcome you. Don't hesitate to visit our profile on Instagram (quinta_das_lameiras) or FB (Quinta das Lameiras - Sº Pedro de Tomar). We have a small grocery store where you can find products from our farm and other farmers. Depending on the season we have vegetables, fruit, eggs, cottage cheese, olive oil and duck meat, lamb, chicken and turkey, rice, tuna, vinegar, etc. Being happy is the most important thing! Our backyard is the world! Love of João, Sara and Children

title: (6120) Vale Grou -
description: Place pour dormir avec une vue incroyable, compliqué de monté en camping car.

title: (2300) Tomar - 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa
title_short: (2300) Tomar - 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa
description:
Small car park below the convent
ideal in April, surely more complicated in high season free from 8 p.m. to 8 a.m.

address.street: 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa

title: (2300) Tomar - 81 Avenida Doutor Cândido Madureira
description: New laundry downtown, across the street from the tourist office.

name: Parque de Estacionamento
title: (2300) Parque de Estacionamento
description: Paid parking from 8 to 20:00, 3.8 euros for 4 hours maximum. At the foot of the Convent of Christ, with a view of the city. There is also another paid parking lot just below Dr Guimaraes' Avenida. In February, very few vehicles. Preferential access by Av Guimaraes for more than 3.5 T

title: () Tomar - Rua Coronel Luíz António Aparício
title_short: () Tomar - Rua Coronel Luíz António Aparício
description: Parking near town.

title: (3320) Pampilhosa da Serra -
description: You stand flat on a firm sandy surface and you have a beautiful view of almost 360°. There is not a single shadow.

title: (3200-242) Lousã - Variante à Nacional 236
description: Esplanade on the side of the road with good views

title: (6185) Orvalho -
description:
Small place near a hike way.
ideal to one or two night

title: (2200) Abrantes - E806
description: Service station with picnic area, dump station and water. Cartridges or pipe systems,  not a drive on  dumping grate

title: (3200) Coimbra -
description: Free parking located at the foot of the Castelo de Lousâ, has bins and some lighting at night. Nearby there are public baths, natural pools, mountain routes and beautiful villages to visit. We spent one night with a medium-size van and without any problem, there were several ACs next to it, also staying overnight. We were going with a dog and except for the pools we could do everything with her.

title: (2200) Abrantes - Estrada do Gaio
description: Station service in abrantes, has free water, black water disposal and WC cleaning. Little supermarket inside and coffe shop. Outside has picnic tables.

title: (6185) Orvalho -
description: A small place to rest one night. access only 4x4, probably in the winter, will be a little slippery.

name: Piscina Municipal de Fratel
title: (6030) Piscina Municipal de Fratel
description: Service area easily accessible from A23 highway (search 150m gravel access direct from N 3 road, km 176,3, instead via village where you should have to bypass swimming pool!) with gravel free space to P and overnight (not illuminated and a bit unleveled). On summertime, open air swimming pool open and corresponding snack and toilets. Swimming pools (outdoor pools) in Portugal are generally only open from middle June to the end of August/September. NOTE: when swimming pool functions, access to service area during daytime may be impossible :-( because cars park under trees.

title: (3230-267) Penela - 13 Praça Municipio
description: Quiet level parking lot right next to the castle

title: (3230-263) Penela - 15 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
title_short: (3230-263) Penela - 15 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
description: Good place to spend the night, very quiet and with plenty of parking lots in the area.

title: () Penela - 11 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
title_short: () Penela - 11 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
description: Large car park close to the village café and restaurant 2 minutes walk, castle with lovely views, petrol station just across the road.

title: (2300) Tomar -
description: Nice little spot, isolated under the pines, next to the aqueduct. calm.

title: (6185) Orvalho - N238
description: Parking space for cars, although small vans can park here (there is no sign that says you are not allowed). Barbecue, tables in the shade and an amazing view of the surroundings. There are toilets with water tap and even toilet paper.

title: (2305-203) Tomar - Vale dos Pegões
description: Parcheggio

title: (3200) Lousã - 1 Rua Francisco Lopes Fernandes
description: Drinking water taps on the way to Lousa Castle. With a hose clamp we were able to fill up our van. Excellent ??

title: (3330) Góis - Estr. das Beiras
description: Parking very easy to access. Petrol station in direct proximity as well as a restaurant. Possibility to see with the restaurateur and the gas station attendant to get water. Beautiful view over the whole valley, with several possible walks among the eucalyptus trees.

title: (6185) Orvalho - 6 Travessa Adro
description: Parking near the church

name: Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
title: (6120) Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
title_short: (6120) Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
description:
Camp site private 
The beautiful surroundings were devastated by a fire in the summer of 2017.
The site is quiet and neat. Prices are cheap and people are nice. There are no shops around so don't forgot to shop before arriving.

title: () - Rua do Ferreiro
description: Large parking in a village with all the comforts. Toilet, store, games, table and water.

title: (3240) - Unnamed Road
description: Lovely hill top spot at the Outeiro traditional windmills. Gravel approach track and large, fairly flat parking area. No shade. Beautiful views all round. Lots of walking paths around this area.

title: (6040) Gavião - Unnamed Road
description: Good gravel parking for the night. The other spot next to it is forbidden to the motorhome, the Police monitors .. The train goes on the other bank but not disturbing, just the guard dogs of the houses are watching you and barking. 4G full bar.

title: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 12 Rua Doutor David Serras Pereira
title_short: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 12 Rua Doutor David Serras Pereira
description: Church square in Alferrarede. Free parking to share with locals. The bells do not ring after 20h.

title: (3200) - CM1235
description: Old venue for the Cabeço do Moiro festivities. Tem água e sanitários. Fabulous sight on Lousã.

name: Uxa Paraíso
title: (3230-290) Uxa Paraíso
description: Small, intimate campsite in nature yet just outside of the small historic town of Penela with all its amenities. The easiest way to reach the place is to look for the "Church of Nossa Senhora da Conceiçao" (google maps knows it in Penela) and from there just follow the large blue signs UXA PARAISO all the way to the parking space and come find me at the bar/swimming pool. Also feel free to contact me if you need a little extra push in the last uphill.

title: (6030) Vila Velha de Ródão - Unnamed Road
title_short: (6030) Vila Velha de Ródão - Unnamed Road
description: Close to the Penedo Gordo Viewpoint.  Going up to the lookout post we have a 360° paradisiacal view.  Vila Velha de Ródão is at our feet as is the Tejo river.  We stayed 1 night without any problems. 4G at maximum level. Don't forget to collect your trash and also the distracted ones. Enjoy

title: (6030) - Autoestrada da Beira Interior
description: Rest area is the main Highway (Motorway), A23, it has free water has air for check pressure in tires. Very clean bathroom, and good breakfast, with local products. Fill your tank of fuel and water (free and large flow). It has gas pump and bottles. Very good stop!

title: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 1B Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Intermarche services. free black and grey drains. tokens from the petrol station for electric hook u and drinking water. intermarche, bricomarche and car wash and garage next door. Clean services easy access. close to historic monument.

title: (6030) Vila Velha de Ródão -
description: Place on the edge of the small road with a magnificent view! Be careful, the road to get there is narrow, difficult CC access!

title: (3200) Lousã - Rua Doutor José Pinto de Aguiar
title_short: (3200) Lousã - Rua Doutor José Pinto de Aguiar
description: Parking lot of Continente/ Modelo Supermarket.

title: (3200-002) Lousã - 4 Rua Doutor Pedro Lemos
description: Laundry in Intermarche supermarket, easy parking
